name: Lifestyle, Mental Health, Self
who_you_serve: He serves a broad audience interested in personal development, mental health, and lifestyle improvement, including individuals seeking motivation and guidance.
what_you_do: Jay Shetty is a global bestselling author, award-winning podcast host of On Purpose, Chief Purpose Officer of Calm, and a purpose-driven entrepreneur who provides guidance on mental health and lifestyle changes.
